short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto show sensitive content on twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Let twitter user don't need to click the show button to view sensitive content.
You can customize the content you want to show automatically, includes Nudity, Violence, Sensitive content on Post tab and allow the feature to validate on Media tab(which is a independent option)

--------------------------------------------------------

Supported Languages: 
- English
- 繁體中文
- 简体中文
- 日本語
- 한국어
